name: CodeX
description:
CodeX is an atmospheric adventure game that doesn't have any hints, in-game marker, quest log or savepoint.

The story is told through Environmental Storytelling and the player has to find out for himself how to progress by using or moving objects and solving small puzzles.

The game is developed by a very small Indie Developer on Unreal Engine 5.

Features


  • Environmental Storytelling
  • Thrilling Story
  • Atmospheric Gameplay
  • No Savepoint
  • No In-Game Marker How To Progress
